sentences.sentence: "Petrificus Totalus! " Harry bellowed again, backing away as he swiped his wand through the air; six or seven of them crumpled, but more were coming toward him. "Impedimenta! Incarcerous! "
sentences.translation: “统统石化！”哈利又大喊一声，他一边后退一边使劲在空中挥舞着魔杖。六七具阴尸被击倒了，但是更多的阴尸朝他逼来。“障碍重重！速速禁锢！”
